text: Claude Sautet (23 February 1924 â€“ 22 July 2000) was a French movie director and screenwriter. His first movie, Hello Smile! came out in 1956. He was well known for his movie The Things of Life, which he wrote and directed. Sautet died of liver cancer in Paris at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:French screenwriters Category:French movie directors
title: Claude Sautet
